channel.title: Guitar Hero: World Tour
channel.description:
Hmm, my mate has GH:WT and I was pondering whether or not I should invest, looks pretty fun, quite pricey however. I'm just wondering if it is worth it, I'd quite frankly rather put my money towards my new bike, but oh well..
PS: Comments and thoughts on the game?

item.title: Guitar Hero: World Tour
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I’d go for the bike. I mean, from what I’ve heard you were quite successful. And to be honest, if I were your dad and I would chuck in some money for the new bike, I’d be a bit disappointed if my son wasted his money on a game.

Read full topic

item.title: Guitar Hero: World Tour
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:13, topic:244584”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=320969.msg2540816#msg2540816 date=1226980100]
Yes I do mean a motorbike. I am talking about a brand new Yz250f, and we nearly have enough. I tried to convince dad that a second hand bike would be alright, but he said I work hard, and have shown that I am devoted to being good in mx, so he said we’ll work together for a new bike, almost 15k AUD.
[/quote]

After a quick search on google, I found a site that is selling brand new Yamaha YZ 250F’s for $6249 USD which converts to 9504.16 AUD.

Offtopic: Didn’t you use to ride a http://www.motorcyclistonline.com/2008/yamaha/yz/85/24458/05/index.html ? Hence the Yz85racer.[/quote]
Yes, except mine was the 2007 model, and a big wheel which for some reason adds a bit too the price. But, I didn’t mean just the bike, the gear, racing fees, training (by professionals, it’s required in Australia for some fucking gay reason), etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Guitar Hero: World Tour
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Yz85Racer:

Yes I do mean a motorbike. I am talking about a brand new Yz250f, and we nearly have enough. I tried to convince dad that a second hand bike would be alright, but he said I work hard, and have shown that I am devoted to being good in mx, so he said we’ll work together for a new bike, almost 15k AUD.

After a quick search on google, I found a site that is selling brand new Yamaha YZ 250F’s for $6249 USD which converts to 9504.16 AUD.

Offtopic: Didn’t you use to ride a http://www.motorcyclistonline.com/2008/yamaha/yz/85/24458/05/index.html ? Hence the Yz85racer.

item.title: Guitar Hero: World Tour
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

I don’t like these type of games, but Rock Band blows Guitar Hero out of the water.

i rage because i suck at them :’(

item.title: Guitar Hero: World Tour
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“Kane., post:8, topic:244584”][quote author=Squigglyo link=topic=320969.msg2539296#msg2539296 date=1226926993]
perhaps its because i already own a bike

or perhaps its only because ive had the game for about 2 days total play time.

But i’d still go for the game… cmon we are on an internet forum primarily made for scripters… your not gunna use the bike, who are you tryin to fool?
[/quote]
YZ used to race in competitions and such, but his bike was stolen. So I’m pretty sure he would race again.
It is quite pricey.

How much is the bike YZ? Do you mean a new motorbike or just bicycle?[/quote]

He needs a new motorbike, which (my guess), a used bike can range from $2000-$10,000 and a new bike is more then that. Honestly, I’ve heard that GWT is pretty bad, and Rock Band 2 is a much better choice. If it all comes down to choosing, I’d rather have a motorbike over any game.

Read full topic

@XxKanexX wrote:

Not a fan of the whole Guitar Hero series. I bought one of the games, played it for 3 days, and haven’t played it since.

I’d save up for the bike.

item.title: Guitar Hero: World Tour
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

World Tour is awesome. I know this and i haven’t even played it yet. Ive been jamming my ass off in #3 for about 1 week, beaten most things excluding Expert. Saw World Tour in the shop being played and its a million times better.

WOrld Tour > Bike
No contest

Read full topic
